title: Jinx is actually freelo
body: Her early game isn't that bad with all of her rocket harass and there aren't many ADCs that can really push her out of lane except for a few.  She only has to wait until level 9 to get Tristana range and with her resets she's really good at teamfights as long as there isn't a Jarvan on the enemy team.  Not to mention she's probably the fastest tower killer in the game.
